Wand Specialization.name: Wand Specialization
descriptions: Increases your damage with Wands by 25%.
Increases your damage with Wands by 50%.

Arcane Focus.name: Arcane Focus
descriptions: Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 1% and gives you a 20% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.
Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 2% and gives you a 40% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.
Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 3% and gives you a 60% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.
Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 4% and gives you a 80% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.
Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 5% and gives you a 100% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.

Elemental Precision.name: Elemental Precision
descriptions: Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Frost and Fire spells by 1%.
Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Frost and Fire spells by 2%.
Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Frost and Fire spells by 3%.

Arcane Resilience.name: Arcane Resilience
descriptions: Increases your armor by an amount equal to 50% of your Intellect and increases the effects of your Mage Armor by 10%.
Increases your armor by an amount equal to 100% of your Intellect and increases the effects of your Mage Armor by 20%.
Increases your armor by an amount equal to 150% of your Intellect and increases the effects of your Mage Armor by 30%.

Practical Defensive Magic.name: Practical Defensive Magic
descriptions: Increases the effect of your Amplify Magic and Dampen Magic spells by 25%, decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by 25%, and gives your Polymorph a 45% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage.

Increases the effect of your Amplify Magic and Dampen Magic spells by 50%, decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by 50%, and gives your Polymorph a 90% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage.

Magic Absorption.name: Magic Absorption
descriptions: Increases all resistances by 5 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 1% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.
Increases all resistances by 10 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 2% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.
Increases all resistances by 15 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 3% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.
Increases all resistances by 20 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 4% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.
Increases all resistances by 25 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 5% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.

Master of Elements.name: Master of Elements
descriptions: Your Fire and Frost spell criticals will refund 10% of their base mana cost.
Your Fire and Frost spell criticals will refund 20% of their base mana cost.
Your Fire and Frost spell criticals will refund 30% of their base mana cost.

Arcane Subtlety.name: Arcane Subtlety
descriptions: Reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by 5 and reduces the threat caused by your Arcane spells by 25%.
Reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by 10 and reduces the threat caused by your Arcane spells by 50%.

Arcane Concentration.name: Arcane Concentration
descriptions: Gives you a 2% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell cast.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next spell by 100%.
Gives you a 4% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell cast.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next spell by 100%.
Gives you a 6% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell cast.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next spell by 100%.
Gives you a 8% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell cast.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next spell by 100%.
Gives you a 10% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell cast.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next spell by 100%.

Spell Twisting.name: Spell Twisting
descriptions:
Your Fire combat spells increases your chance to get a critical strike chance with your next Frost damage spell by 15%.

Your Frost combat spells increases your chance to get a critical strike chance with your next Fire damage spell by 15%.

Your Arcane combat spells increases your chance to get a critical strike chance with your next  Fire or Frost damage spell by 15%.

Practical Offensive Magic.name: Practical Offensive Magic
descriptions: Gives your Counterspell a 50% chance to silence the target for 6 seconds, reduces the cooldown of your Counterspell and Blink spells by 10%, and increases the radius of your Arcane Explosion by 1 yards.

Gives your Counterspell a 100% chance to silence the target for 6 seconds, reduces the cooldown of your Counterspell and Blink spells by 20%, and increases the radius of your Arcane Explosion by 2 yards.

Arcane Instability.name: Arcane Instability
descriptions: Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 2%.
Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 3%.
Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 4%.
Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 5%.

Arcane Meditation.name: Arcane Meditation
descriptions: Allows 10% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 20% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 30% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

Arcane Power.name: Arcane Power
descriptions: When activated, your spells deal 30% more damage while costing 30% more mana to cast.  This effect lasts 15 seconds.

Arcane Wrath.name: Arcane Wrath
descriptions: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Arcane spells by 50%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Arcane spells by 100%.

Arcane Mind.name: Arcane Mind
descriptions: Increases your total Intellect by 3%.
Increases your total Intellect by 6%.
Increases your total Intellect by 9%.
Increases your total Intellect by 12%.
Increases your total Intellect by 15%.

Time Pressure.name: Time Pressure
descriptions: Increases the casting speed by 4%.
Increases the casting speed by 8%.
Increases the casting speed by 12%.
Increases the casting speed by 16%.
Increases the casting speed by 20%.

Improved Arcane Power.name: Improved Arcane Power
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Arcane Power by 1 min and increases duration by 3 secs.
Reduces the cooldown of your Arcane Power by 2 min and increases duration by 5 secs.

Mind Mastery.name: Mind Mastery
descriptions: Increases spell damage by up to 5% of your total Intellect and increases the effect of your Arcane Intellect by 20%.
Increases spell damage by up to 10% of your total Intellect and increases the effect of your Arcane Intellect by 40%.
Increases spell damage by up to 15% of your total Intellect and increases the effect of your Arcane Intellect by 60%.
Increases spell damage by up to 20% of your total Intellect and increases the effect of your Arcane Intellect by 80%.
Increases spell damage by up to 25% of your total Intellect and increases the effect of your Arcane Intellect by 100%.

Brilliance Aura.name: Brilliance Aura
descriptions: Generates 1% of total Mana every undefined sec to all party members within 30 yds.
